comments.comment: Thanks for catching... This is a bug in JIT kernel for pooling. Can you please try this <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/rsdubtso/4c2bb282ddd9c0018ce4c9909a561181>patch</denchmark-link> ?

One more defect in u8 variant of pooling for Intel SSE 4.2 is addressed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oneapi-src/oneDNN/commit/d19482317ceb878bc014f927c6d34ba2ee01b679>d194823</denchmark-link> .
